column4: Hello, World! I've done everything including blacklist pcspkr to get my system to not beep on shutdown, but it still does!!! I've isolated the annoying beep to the shutdown command itself -- does anyone know how to suppress this sound or maybe trigger a more pleasant one?
I saw that a lot in fresh jackalope installs, and it didn't go away until I upgraded to koala.
lots of stuff got fixed with the newer kernels, but this still happens and it drives me nuts
is it like the multiple beep (almost a ringing)?
nope, just SUPER LOUD system beep that makes your ears implode and sink into your head
